attributes.action: ban the development and subsequent publishing of ridiculous petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having trawled through some of the c.25,000 rejected e-petitions contained on the Number 10 site, I feel compelled to call for legislation to prevent the posting of inane e-petitions.  Furthermore, as a second part of this potential legislation, we seek to give government authority(ies) the power to arrest people on mass for the crime (felony or misdemeanor) of stupidity / attempted stupidity.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
